intro: "Those Games" are back! Play through familiar minigames to your heart's content! Take on five different minigames with a total of 250 stages!
description:
YEAH! YOU WANT "THOSE GAMES," RIGHT? SO HERE YOU GO! NOW, LET'S SEE YOU CLEAR THEM! 2Also known as "Those Games 2", this is the second in our series of minigame collections.
We've all seen games out there that we've wanted to play to our heart's content, but couldn't.
So, we developed this game with cute and comical stickman characters for you to fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably play as many times as you want!

Play through different minigame stages and complete missions in Minigame mode!
Clearing all minigame stages will unlock a Rank-Up Challenge, where you can compare your score and clear time to other players in monthly rankings.

Use the coins you earn in game to win prizes at the Gotcha! machine. Get new titles and plates to customize your player nameplate.
There are a total of 30,375,000 combinations to choose from! Make something cool, or funny, or cute, and really express yourself!

Key Features
・Second in the series of Stickman minigame collections
・Cute and comical 3D animations and visuals
・Play familiar-looking minigames to your heart's content
・Compete against other players from around the world in Rank-Up Challenges
・Use coins to get new plates and titles from the Gotcha!
・Combine plates and titles to create and customize your own Title Plate
・View global leaderboards updated every month in Latest Rankings
・Complete a variety of different missions to earn rewards
